alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 15 at 12:01PM MDT until June 16 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Idaho, including the following county, Fremont. * WHEN...Until 200 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1159 AM MDT, Emergency management has reported on going flooding in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ashton, Marysville, Henrys Lake, Parker, Drummond, Ashton Reservoir, Last Chance, Island Park Reservoir, Ponds Lodge, Chester, Shotgun Village, Macks Inn, St Anthony, Island Park Village, Egin, Warm River, Ashton Hill, Harriman State Park, Mesa Falls State Park and Big Springs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
